column17:
Dress up in this red and white striped shirt by Oxemberg and gather compliments from one and all. This shirt is made of cotton has a button-down collar chest pocket rolled up sleeves button placket and gives you a regular-fit. Make a statement in your casual outing when you enter in a stylish look.

Features
  • Fabric: Cotton
  • Colour: Red White
  • Pattern: Bold Stripes
  • Front: Full-buttoned placket
  • Sleeves: Long sleeves with mid-arm button tab
  • Collar: Button-down collar
  • Pockets: 1 chest pocket
  • Back: Yoked
  • Hemline: Curved
  • Fit: Regular









Looks good with a pair of trousers or denims and shoes.

Wash & Care
Do not bleach or dry clean
Wash with like colours
Line dry
Warm Iron
